item.title: SCAR improvement
item.dc:creator: @spidi550 spidi550
item.description:
@spidi550 wrote:

Hello…
I need some serious help with SCAR scripts
I TELL FIRST BEVORE PEAPLE THINK I STEAL----()(<>_<>)()
I did take this script couse its good(but can get better)

{ TTTTTTTTTTTT
TT
TT
TT
TT
TT KK KK
TT KK KKKK
KK KK
KKKKK
KK KKK
KK KKK
KK KK
KK KK
KK KK

     ToneKray Scriptings
       Take Advantage

          Versions
     0.1 Got the basic Cut Oak
     0.4 Loaded with Si.Scar
     0.7 Added Prog report
     0.9 Added drop feature
     1.0 Projected release
     1.1 Added AntiRandoms
     1.2 Added Login Feature
     1.3 Added length timer
     1.4 Added Form
     1.6 Got rid of form(hassle)
     1.9 Added a hell of stuff
     2.0 Made 'Paid for only'

            Known Bugs
Bug:When dropping it might not drop

Answer:Give RuneScape more CPU by closing other programs

                                }

program OakCutter;
Var x,y,c,loaddone,logscut,clicktoplay:integer;

{.include Si.Scar}
{.include Par.txt}

Const LampSkill = ‘Mining’; //What skill you want to be increased in case of Lamp
Const load = 99; //How many loads you want 0 is unlimited
Const OakLog = 3430258; //Color of the Oak Log
Const Username = ‘test’; //Username of the acount you will like to use
Const Password = ‘test’; //Password (CasE SentSiVe!)

procedure CutOak;
begin
repeat
If(FindObj(x,y,‘Chop’,3305568,10))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(1000+random(500))
end;
until(Invincount=28)
end;

Procedure LoadScriptOAK;
Begin
Writeln(’ TTTTTTTTTTTT’)
Writeln(’ TT’)
Writeln(’ TT’)
Writeln(’ TT’)
Writeln(’ TT’)
Writeln(’ TT KK KK’)
Writeln(’ TT KK KKKK’)
Writeln(’ KK KK’)
Writeln(’ KKKKK’)
Writeln(’ KK KKK’)
Writeln(’ KK KKK’)
Writeln(’ KK KK’)
Writeln(’ KK KK’)
Writeln(’ KK KK’)
Writeln(’~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~’)
Writeln(’~ToneKray Scripting~’)
Writeln(’~~Take Advantage’)
end;

procedure Startupdropper;
begin
writeln(’====ToneKrays Auto Dropper====’);
writeln(’====Mr.Dropper in progress====’);
end;

procedure AutoDropped;
begin
if(findcolor(x,y,OakLog,537,397,754,468))then
DropColor(OakLog);
WriteLn(’===Complete!===’);
WriteLn(’==Made by ToneKray==’);
end;

Procedure ProgReport;
Begin
Writeln(‘You have done ‘+inttostr(loaddone)+’ Loads’)
Writeln(‘You have cut ‘+inttostr(logscut)+’ Logs!’)
Writeln(‘Your WoodCutting skill right now is ‘+inttostr(GetSkillLevel(‘WoodCutting’))+’!’)
end;

Procedure Logmein;
begin

Clicktoplay := BitmapFromString(79, 68, ‘z78DAB59DD176E2CA0’ +
‘E447F890402E1719249FEFF93CE0CF25DB7FA6C552143CEC37831’ +
‘C631A6ABA52E95D4E2F871381E0EA7F7C3EBE17034AFCF5FAF879’ +

If(IsTextInAreaEx(395,273,525,306,x,y,‘Existing’,150,chrUpChars,false,true,0,1,-1))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
if(IsTextInAreaEx(288,245,367,265,x,y,‘Username’,150,chrUpChars,false,true,0,1,-1))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
SendText(Username)
SendKeys(chr(13))
SendText(Password)
SendKeys(chr(13))
If(IsTextInAreaEx(282,312,326,333,x,y,‘Login’,150,chrUpChars,false,true,0,1,-1))then
begin
repeat
wait(1000)
until(findbitmap(Clicktoplay,x,y))
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
end;
end;
end;
freebitmap(Clicktoplay)
end;

begin
Loadinclude(‘Notepad’,false);
SetAccount(1,Username,Password)
If(loggedout=true)then
begin
Logmein;
end;
AxeColors;
LoadScriptOAK;
ChatsOff;
SetRun(true)
GetSkillLevel(‘WoodCutting’)
C:=0
Logscut:=0
loaddone:=0
repeat
FindStrangeBox;
Check4randoms;
Check4Lamp(Lampskill)
CutOak;
If(InvinCount=28)then
Begin
FindStrangeBox;
Check4randoms;
Check4Lamp(Lampskill)
Logscut:=logscut+27
Startupdropper;
AutoDropped;
C:=c+1;
Loaddone:=loaddone+1
Progreport;
FindStrangeBox;
Check4randoms;
Check4Lamp(Lampskill)
end;
until(c=Load)
Logout;
Writeln(‘I have completed ‘+inttostr(Loaddone)+’ and that was how much you told me to do’)
end.program New;
begin
end.

The problem = thet it cant handle allot of hours…
By example i used it and looked
-a mesterious box got to me
-my axe whas broken
-i didnt had more axes :eek:
so if u can get more improved scripts ill get a face like
The mail =www.cem_master_plan@hotmail.com

Read full topic
